item.title: Suggestions on a cheap effective vps to host from australia with the tos n shit
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

[quote=“RLN, post:15, topic:442678”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=545362.msg3999019#msg3999019 date=1337693846]

http://prq.se

That is probably the worst shit I ever seen… Only good thing with prq is that they are located in Sweden.

@Jack; Take a look at this site http://yardvps.com/
Very cheap, very good support.
[/quote]Uh, and they don’t give a shit about copyright infringement? Can you elaborate as to why prq is shit?

@OP, don’t listen to this retard. If you end up not caring about copyright infringement… http://lowendbox.com and http://webhostingtalk.com … otherwise prq is good for you.[/quote]
Why would he pay from 100-300 US Dollar to host King-PK? EDIT: with RSC that mostly do not give a damn shit about copyright?
And get fucked for another 107 US dollars /hour, everytime you need help?

Also if you use google, you can se that they are not good at what they are doing, mostly down and very expensive. I think that’s enough for saying PRQ is shit.

The other you mentioned are quite good though.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions on a cheap effective vps to host from australia with the tos n shit
item.dc:creator: @Outspoken Outspoken
item.description:
@Outspoken wrote:

Captain Jack Sparrow:

better off bein protected in some way if the host is in a diff country or something? im jus not sure if you can run all of them from australia… i think u can… lol ^ shit prices yeah.

I think you mean you’re looking for a host that doesn’t respond to copyright notices. Off the top of my head I don’t know of any hosts that will ignore them, and they’re hard to find.

Read full topic
